greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Product of such primes p that both p and p-2 divide n, and p-2 is also prime.
comment: Product of those distinct greater twin primes (A006512) that divide n for which the corresponding lesser twin prime (A001359) also divides n.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..15015
Antti Karttunen, Data supplement: n, a(n) computed for n = 1..100000
mathematica: f[p_, n_] := If[PrimeQ[p + 2] && Divisible[n, p + 2], p + 2, 1]; a[n_] := Times @@ (f[#, n] & /@ FactorInteger[n][[;; , 1]]); Array[a, 120] (* _Amiram Eldar_, Dec 16 2018 *)
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Dec 16 2018
